text: Anson was a community, now extinct, in Richland Township, Miami County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== Anson was laid out in 1853. When the Indianapolis, Peru and Chicago Railroad was built in Miami County, it was not extended to Anson, and the village became a ghost town. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Geography of Miami County, Indiana Category:Former populated places in Indiana Category:Ghost towns in Indiana
title: Anson, Indiana
